title: Design Patterns with various techniques applied
ques:
I am going to do a project on 'Design Patterns with various techniques applied'.  Could anyone tell me the techniques which we can apply?  And could anyone also please provide me the required information as to how could I accomplish my project work?

Thanks.

answers.ans:
I am afraid your question is not very clear. 
What do you mean when you say  'various techniques applied '?

Hi,

Can you please tell what is the purpose of creating the project? Also what do you mean by  'various technique applied '.

I think your are asking you are going to do a project that title is  'Design Patterns with various techniques applied ' i think so.
My idea is you just collect all the Design Patterns from dofactory site.
I hope dofactory site gave example for each and every Design Patterns just you can use it and make your project.
